altTitles.fr: Le Nectar de la Malédiction Divine

altTitles.th: ศึกน้ำทิพย์แห่งมนตรา

description.en: Sakura, the last surviving princess of a fallen kingdom, is being hunted down for the power of Ambrosia she possesses - the ability to grant divine strength, but only to a human. With no human companion, she decides to summon one from another world in a desperate attempt to find a knight to protect her, but the man who answers her call is less than what she had hoped for.
description.pt-br: Sakura, a última princesa de um reino caído está sendo caçada devido ao poder de ambrosia que possui- habilidade a qual concede força divina, mas apenas aos humanos. Sem nenhum companheiro humano enquanto fugia, ela se viu obrigada a invocar desesperadamente um cavaleiro de outro mundo para se proteger, mas o homem que ela acaba invocando aparenta ser muito menos do que ela gostaria do que fosse. Conseguirá Sakura se proteger?

altTitles.ja: アライブ 最終進化的少年

description.en:
A strange virus is making its way around the globe, causing its victims to commit suicide. In less than a week, it's become a lethal pandemic. Now a group of Tokyo teens who have survived the outbreak are wondering why they are still alive.  
  
 [Official Korean](https://ridibooks.com/books/505001316)   
 [Official Chinese](https://book.douban.com/series/10615)

Minaguchi Kaoru is nothing special. He's no good at sports or school, isn't in any clubs, and he's not popular. He has no friends and isn't even interested in any of the girls he knows. He's also teased due to the fact that he loves shoujo manga. Unlike the harem daydreams of his peers, he dreams of finding his true love. Unfortunately, a shinigami comes to kill him, simply because he's a "forever alone" sort of guy. When he gasps out his intention of embracing life with his final breaths, though, she takes it back! As long as he follows through on his intentions, he won't be killed.  
  
To convince the shinigami that his plans are genuine, he declares that he will confess to the girl he likes, the very next day. Expecting failure with confessing to random girls in his school, he sends out love letters to four different girls. To his surprise, they all agree to be his girlfriend. Now, this shoujo-manga-loving guy has ended up in a kind of harem story, quadruple-timing four girls! Will he be able to stay involved with the girls without they finding about each other?

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

Gumiho Yeon, who despises humans, accidentally avoids an accident with the help of human Dong-i. In essence, a nine-tailed fox is a being that has to repay the favor it receives. Yeon visits Dong-i without skipping a day for Bo-eun, and Dong-i is only burdened with such a kite. The two, who seemed never to be able to get closer, know each other's wounds and shortcomings, fill them in, and develop good feelings... The two are different in their environment, race, and way of loving. Can a nine-tailed fox and human love have a happy ending?
description.ko:
인간을 멸시하는 구미호 연은 우연히 인간인 동이의 도움을 받아 사고를 면하게 된다.

본디 구미호란 은혜를 입으면 갚아야만 하는 존재.
연은 보은을 위해 하루도 거르지 않고 동이를 찾아가고, 동이는 그런 연이 부담스럽기만 하다.

절대 가까워질 수 없을 것 같던 둘은 서로의 상처와 결핍을 알고, 채워주며 좋은 감정을 키워나가는데...

살아온 환경도, 종족도, 사랑하는 방식마저 다른 둘. 구미호와 인간의 사랑은 과연 행복한 결말로 맺어질 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: となりのフィギュア原型師

description.en: Ryutaro Hando is a figure prototype maker, a person who creates the basis for mass production of figures. He is a skilled but somewhat socially awkward member of the workshop he has joined. This yonkoma story can be enjoyed by both figure lovers and those who are not interested in figures.
description.ja: 半藤隆太郎は個人で活動するフィギュア原型師。原型師とはフィギュアなどの大量生産の元になるものを作る人で、腕は確かだが、少々人付き合いが苦手な彼が入った工房のメンバーは見た目子供の工房代表、美少女好き、クリーチャー好きと超個性的で、彼らは、手先は器用、でも生き方は不器用。フィギュア好きも、フィギュアに関心がなくても楽しめるワイド４コマ。

altTitles.en: Revenge of the Sword Clan's Hound
Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound
Return of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound
The Return of the Iron-Blood Sword Hound

altTitles.fr: La revanche du limier des Baskerville

altTitles.pt-br: O retorno do cão de caça dos Baskerville
A vingança do cão de caça de sangue de ferro Baskerville

altTitles.es: La venganza del sabueso de la espada sangrienta

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del sabueso de sangre de hierro

altTitles.th: การกลับมาของหมาล่าเนื้อตระกูลดาบเลือดเหล็ก

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

title.en: I'm Looking for a New Husband

description.en:
Liat, who had experienced death due to her husband's betrayal, repeatedly rewound time at the cost of half her lifespan. Eventually, she broke the cycle by delivering her husband's head to the emperor. With only 1 year and 3 months left to live, she has one wish:

"I want to fall in love."

Thus, a public announcement spreads throughout the empire for Liat's husband recruitment contest—with a prize of a staggering "10 billion gold." As suitors begin to flock, suspicious individuals also start gathering around her...

altTitles.en: The Life of the Witch Who Remains Single for About 300 Years!

description.en: Once, Kurokawa Mikage was the fearful “Witch of Moonlight,” but now, 300 years later, she’s just an office lady and teased by her co-workers for still being single. Mikage thinks she’s fine with her ultimate spinster life, posting fake photos of a pretend relationship… Until the young and handsome Kobayashi Satoru joins her company! Is this the start of a real, bewitching romance at last!?

title.en: Let’s Keep This Love a Secret from Everyone

altTitles.ja: この恋は、みんなにはナイショ。

description.en: A oneshot series of secret love stories.

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

The prologue and epilogue of the drama, "King the Land."

Cheon Sarang, who smiles the brightest in the entire world, and Gu Won, who hates smiles.

The true first meeting of the two, as well as the stories of the times that have passed by.

Meet them through Author Spoon's sparkling webtoon ❤️
description.pt-br:
A história de antes e depois do dorama <Sorriso Real>.

Com Sarang, uma garota que tem o sorriso mais brilhante do mundo e Guwon, um garoto que odeia sorrisos.

Conheça o verdadeiro primeiro encontro dos dois e as histórias de suas vidas durante a emocionante webtoon desenhada pela artista de “Quem Me Fez Uma Princesa”, Spoon!

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

altTitles.ja: マーメイドメロディー　『ぴちぴちピッチ　ａｑｕａ』

altTitles.en: Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch: Aqua

description.en: Lukia Nanami is turning seventeen. Her family has just moved to a town by the sea, and on her first walk down to the beach, she saves a handsome surfer from drowning. The next day, she’s shocked to discover he’s not only a classmate at her new school, but has no idea who she is, and insists he was saved by a mermaid! A new chapter in the saga of *Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch*, from original artist Pink Hanamori! [Kodansha]

altTitles.ja: メトロイド サムス＆ジョイ

description.en: A comic based on the action game series *Metroid.* Samus Aran, a legendary warrior, and Joey, a young boy who wants to be as strong as his late father, are about to embark on an epic adventure across the galaxy!

Tsumire Yuuki, a high school student suddenly lost her mother. The person appearing before her at this time is the lawyer Koudai Hino, telling her that she's actually the granddaughter of a wealthy estate owner. After being taken in by her grandfather, and living a life of luxury, Tsumire's heart starts to waver towards Koudai that's always by her side.  
  
Pt-Br:  
Yuuki Tsumire foi criada por sua mãe solteira, que sempre ensinou a ela para sempre continuar sorrindo, não importasse o quanto fosse difícil. As duas eram uma família, até a mãe da Tsumire morrer por causa de uma doença. Logo após isso ela descobre que tem uma família que ela nem conhecia, uma família fria e rica. Tsumire agora precisa viver com essa família, mesmo que pareça que nenhum deles deseja que ela viva lá. Ela não precisa trocar de escola, por isso ainda tem os seus amigos, mas ela não quer causar mais problemas para eles, por isso sempre guarda os seus problemas para sí mesma. Mas para a surpresa dela, um advogado da família chamado Hino, se torna o seu "apoio sentimental", mas as ações da Tsumire fazem parecer que ela queria que ele fosse algo a mais…

The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)

altTitles.ja: レプリカだって、恋をする。

altTitles.en: Even a Replica Falls in Love

altTitles.vi: Kể Cả Bản Sao Cũng Biết Yêu

description.en:
On days when she is sick, on days when she has a tedious day job, on days when she has regular tests.

On days when she is too lazy to go to school, I am called upon.
I am a convenient substitute for the body of a girl named Sonao Aikawa, and that is me.
I may look exactly the same, but my personality is a little different.
I can't go out freely, I can't even make plans for tomorrow,
I am a replica whose mission is to work for the original.
I was supposed to be a replica, but I fell in love.

A very pure and slightly mysterious "love story" that takes place in a town by the sea.
description.ru:
В дни, когда она болеет, в дни, когда у нее нудная дневная работа, в дни, когда у нее очередные контрольные.

В дни, когда ей лень идти в школу, обращаются ко мне.
Я - удобный заменитель тела девушки по имени Сунао Аикава, и это я.
Может, я и выгляжу точно так же, но характер у меня немного другой.
Я не могу свободно выходить на улицу, не могу даже строить планы на завтра,
Я - копия, чья миссия - работать на оригинал.
Я должна была стать копией, но я влюбилась.

Очень красивая и немного загадочная "история любви", которая происходит в городке на берегу моря.
description.vi:
Vào những ngày mà cô ấy bị cảm, vào những ngày mà cô ấy có một công việc tẻ nhạt, vào những ngày mà cô ấy có bài kiểm tra thường xuyên.

Vào những ngày mà cô ấy quá lười để đi học, tôi được gọi ra.
Tôi là vật thay thế cho cơ thể của một cô gái tên là Sonao Aikawa, và đó chính là tôi.
Tôi có lẽ trông giống hệt họ, nhưng mà tính cách của tôi thì có hơi khác một chút.
Tôi không thể tự do ra ngoài được, tôi cũng chẳng thể nào lên kế hoạch cho ngày mai.
Tôi chỉ được coi là một bản sao thôi, nhưng tôi đã biết yêu.

Một "chuyện tình" rất trong sáng và có chút bí ẩn diễn ra tại một thị trấn ven biển.
description.es-la:
En los días en que se siente enferma, en los días en que tiene la trabajosa tarea de ser responsable del turno, en los días de exámenes regulares...
 
Cuando ella no tiene ganas de ir a la escuela, me llaman a mí. Soy el duplicado de Sonao Aikawa, una niña llamada Sonao, un sustituto conveniente. 

Aunque nuestra apariencia es completamente idéntica, nuestras personalidades son un poco diferentes. No puedo salir libremente ni planificar mis propios planes para el día siguiente. Soy una réplica cuyo propósito es trabajar en beneficio del original. Eso es lo que se suponía que era, pero me enamoré.

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

altTitles.ja: Do It Yourself!! -どぅー・いっと・ゆあせるふ-

description.en: Building furniture and friendships have a lot in common. Intention, effort, and hard work are needed for both crafts. This is a story of girls in a DIY club building both as they carve out their futures. None of it comes easy, but that doesn’t stop any of ’em. Furniture, friendships, and the future—they’re building it all with their own hands!

A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

altTitles.en: Ms. Oogami and Keru Bero Suu!

altTitles.ja: 大上さんとケルベロスゥ！

altTitles.zh: 大上同学和可露贝洛苏！

description.en: When Oogami-san was confessed to by one of the three dog eared girls Cer Ber and Us they became friends and started hanging out together. Will this friendship eventually turn into love!? A love story between the three physically identical girls who have totally different personalities and the beautiful lone wolf.

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

description.en:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?
description.es-la: Un oficinista asediado encuentra su camino a un café donde denuncia las dificultades de su rutina. Allí, una amable estudiante de secundaria gyaru se da cuenta de sus lamentos y después de oírle desahogarse, le anima a la manera de "gyaru" e intercambian contactos. ¿Qué será de esta improbable amistad?

The Monster Duchess and the Contract Lady
The Monster Duchess and Contract Princess

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

altTitles.th: สไนเปอร์กระสุนเวท

description.en:
Paraplegic ex-sniper Ha Yiha is getting a fresh start in the VR game “Middle Earth.” He hopes to become a powerful player and earn enough money to afford surgery, but there’s a small problem… an untimely logout leaves him playing as a musketeer, the game’s most ineffective class. Luckily, he’s able to use his real-life sharpshooting skills to take musketeering to new heights. As his unprecedented progress turns heads and prompts new quests, Yiha thinks he’s got a shot at success, but he may have just landed himself directly in danger’s sights.

---

description.ja:
いつも完璧を勝ち取る吉田ローガン。 しかし、不意の事故により下半身不随の障害を負い、社会から捨てられる。 絶望に陥った彼に訪れた、革命的なVRゲーム「ミドルアース」による新しい世界が始まる。 だが、とあるトラブルによりキャラクター選びを大間違い！一番能力の低い「マスケット銃士」を選んでしまう！ “クッソ…俺は他の奴と違う。俺が本物のマスケット銃の力を見せてやる！”

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)

description.ko:
"하 중사, 이 미친놈아. 또 만발인 거 알아?"

이제 말뚝 박을 일만 남은 명사수 부사관 하이하.
그러나 불의의 사고로 하반신을 못 쓰게 되어 사회로 내쳐졌다.
절망에 빠져있던 그에게 혁명적인 VR 게임 [미들 어스]가 새로운 삶을 선사한다.
가상현실 게임인 [미들 어스]에서 획득한 돈은 현실의 돈이 된다!

하지만 캐릭터 생성 때 가장 성능이 낮은 캐릭터를 고르게 되는 바람에 망하게 생겼다!

"난 다르다. 이것이 내 마지막이야!"

흑색화약, 쇠구슬, 꼬질대. 진짜 '머스킷티어'가 무엇인지 보여주마!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AA%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97/179)
description.ru:
Сериал про гиперреалистичную фэнтезийную игру! «Сержант Ха, ты сумасшедший ублюдок. Ты выстрелил еще раз в пулю?» Меткий стрелок Ха ЛиХа просто хотел навсегда стать частью армии. Однако из-за несчастного случая он стал парализованным и был отброшен обратно в общество. Революционная игра VR [Средиземье] подарила ему новую жизнь. Деньги, полученные в [Средиземье], имеют реальную ценность! Тем не менее, он испортил свой шанс, выбрав персонажа самого низкого уровня! «Я не такой, как другие. Это все, что у меня есть». Черный порох, железные шары и шомполы ... Я вам всем покажу, что такое настоящий «мушкетер»!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)

description.th:
ฮาลีฮา นักแม่นปืนแห่งทหารกองหนุนได้เกิดอุบัติเหตุระหว่างขนย้ายดินปืนในค่ายทหาร ทำให้เขาสูญเสียประสาทสัมผัส ของขาทั้งสองข้าง เดินไม่ได้ และต้องใช้เงินผ่าตัดเป็นจำนวนสองพันล้านวอน

หลังจากที่แม่ของเขาเห็นเขาเศร้า หมดอาลัยที่สูญเสียขา ทำให้เธอซื้อเครื่องเล่นเกมเสมือนจริงมาให้เขาเล่น ซึ่งใช้ในการหาเงินได้ด้วย เขารู้สึกดีใจมากที่ได้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้งแม้จะเป็นในเกม และเขาก็ได้ใช้ทักษะนักแม่นปืนของเขากับเกมนี้ด้วย

เขาหวังว่าจะสามารถหาเงินจากการเล่นเกมมาผ่าตัดขาตัวเองให้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้ง

description.es-la: ¡Una serie sobre un juego de fantasía hiperrealista! "Sargent Ha, loco bastardo. ¿Disparó otra ronda completa de tiros al blanco?" El francotirador Ha Lee Ha simplemente quería ser parte del ejército para siempre. Sin embargo, debido a un desafortunado accidente, quedó parapléjico y fue devuelto a la sociedad. El revolucionario juego de realidad virtual [Middle Earth] le presentó una nueva vida. ¡El dinero obtenido en [la Tierra Media] tiene valor en el mundo real! Sin embargo, ¡arruinó su oportunidad al seleccionar el personaje de nivel más bajo! "No soy como los demás. Esto es todo lo que tengo". Pólvora negra, bolas de hierro y baquetas ... ¡Les mostraré lo que es un verdadero 'mosquetero'!
description.pt-br:
Uma série sobre um jogo de fantasia hiper-realista!  
  
“Sargento Ha, seu louco bastardo. Você acertou todos os alvos outra vez?”  
  
O atirador Ha LeeHa simplesmente queria fazer parte do exército para sempre. No entanto, devido a um infeliz acidente, ele ficou paraplégico e foi jogado de volta à sociedade.  
  
O revolucionário jogo de realidade virtual [Terra Média] apresentou-lhe uma nova vida. O dinheiro obtido na [Terra Média] tem valor no mundo real! Ainda assim, ele arruinou sua chance ao selecionar o personagem de nível mais baixo!  
  
“Eu não sou como os outros. Isso é tudo que tenho.”  
  
Pólvora preta, bolas de ferro e varetas… Vou mostrar a todos o que é um verdadeiro ‘mosqueteiro’!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)
---

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…

title.en: Look Me in the Eyes When You Talk

altTitles.el: Κοίτα με στα μάτια όταν μιλάς

description.en: After getting beaten up by a bunch of thugs, an apathetic man who is afraid of looking other people in the eyes wakes up in the hospital, only to discover to his horror that he literally can't see other people's eyes.

Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.ja: 彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

title.en: Migawari Otome no Koufuku-na Yomeiri - Meiko to Musubi no Akashi

altTitles.ja: 身代わり乙女の幸福な嫁入り～めいこと結びのあかし～

description.en:
A story of two people who had a sad fate until they found a new happiness.

The time is the Taisho era.

The orphan Meiko, who suffers from weak eyesight, lives a modest but peaceful life at a temple orphanage. One day, a suspicious person visits the temple and suddenly attacks Meiko.

When she wakes up, she finds that time had rewound several months back. To avoid death, Meiko follows a guide. There she meets her long-lost twin sister, Kanako, the daughter of a marquis... After her parents tell her the story of her birth, Meiko is to marry Matsuwaka Akashi, a military man feared as the "Demon Akashi," as Kanako's substitute-

title.en: Kaidan to Odorou, Soshite Anata wa Kaidan de Odoru

altTitles.en: I'll Dance with Ghost Stories and You'll Dance On the Stairs

altTitles.ja: 怪談と踊ろう そしてあなたは階段で踊る

description.en:
The story is set in a middle school in Shishibone city. Tomohiro Miyajima, the main character of the story, and his group of friends are busy studying for an exam. One day, in search for a thrilling mystery as well as easy money, they take several donation boxes and fabricate a curse to scare everyone: “Ohone-sama’s curse”. After scrawling 骨 (bone) all over the chalkboards and spreading rumors of the curse, the donation boxes are quickly filled and the curse becomes a major legend of the school. Of course, only Tomohiro and his friends knew the curse was fake. It wasn’t possible for anything to happen.  
  
That is, until they receive a donation of 50,000 yen and a letter to go with it, reading: “Please curse Tanashi Miyoko”  
  
Immediately after that letter, bullying and crimes in the school escalated, strange incidents occur, and Tomohiro and his friends are left with a much bigger mystery than they wanted to have, that they are forced to investigate by themselves. What happened shouldn’t have happened. Those who are alive should not be alive, those who know what they know shouldn’t have been able to know, and familiar faces are hardly what they seem, but why? And how?

Eno Kawai is a bright, kind and mischievous high school girl. 
Yuzuki Akehana is a quiet and earnest beauty.

The two started dating due to various reasons, and as they go about their daily lives, the girls grow closer as they navigate the path of love.
description.ja:
明るく優しいイタズラ好きな女子高生。可愛（えの）

無口で一途な童顔の美女。愉月（ゆづき）

二人は"色々あって“付き合うこととなり、日常の中で愛し合い恋の路を歩んでいく…　（一話完結の百合漫画）

title.en: Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennou ni Natta Hanashi

altTitles.en: Headhunted to Another World: From Salaryman to Big Four!

altTitles.ja: サラリーマンが異世界に行ったら四天王になった話

altTitles.en: A Story About a Salaryman Who Goes to Another World and Becomes One of the Four Heavenly Kings

altTitles.tr: Başka Bir Dünyaya Yöneldi: Maaşlı Adamdan Göksel Krala!

altTitles.ru: Из корпоративного раба в приспешники демона

altTitles.en: Office Worker Has Become “Big Four” in the Different World.

description.en: Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman who one day is run over, and left in the street to die, however, when he regains consciousness, it seems as though he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

This work contains controversial content such as violence and rape.

 Please be advised. Captain 'Leon Winston' of the National Intelligence Division of the Western Command of the Rippon Kingdom. Unlike his elegant and noble appearance, he was the object of both envy and damnation for both his allies and enemies, known as the "Vampire of Camden" who would torture the rebels cruelly.

"Every time I see you, I just want to thrust my gun in your tight space."

Strangely, the maid of the interrogation room "Sally Briston" became the object of his desires, as strong as the rage he has for the insurgent rebels. She was ordinary and nothing special... Perhaps it was simply the smell of blood on her that excited him.

The interrogation didn't take long.

He realized it as soon as he heard her name come out from the rebel spy's lips. He no longer needed to suppress his violent desires.

"I stopped myself from tormenting her because I thought she was a good girl, but now there's no need for that. Thank you, Sally. No... Grace."

If you want to live, then try begging.

You never know.

I might hear you out.
description.pt-br:
Esta obra contém conteúdo controverso, como violência e relações coercitivas, que podem ser polarizadores.

Por favor, esteja ciente de que você foi alertado.

Capitão Leon Winston do Comando Ocidental do Reino de Ripon, Divisão de Inteligência Doméstica. Apesar de sua aparência elegante e nobre, ele é conhecido como o "Vampiro de Campton" por sua tortura implacável aos rebeldes, tornando-o reverenciado e amaldiçoado tanto por aliados quanto por inimigos. 

"Eu sempre quis enfiar minha pistola na sua boceta apertada e brincar com ela." 

Curiosamente, a empregada da câmara de tortura, Sally Bristol, tornou-se objeto de seu desejo incontrolável, bem como a raiva que sentia pelos rebeldes. Ela era apenas uma mulher simples e comum... Então por que o cheiro do sangue dela continuava a excitá-lo? 

O mistério não durou muito. 

No momento em que o nome dela escapou dos lábios de um espião rebelde, ele percebeu. Ele não precisava mais reprimir seus desejos violentos. 

"Eu me contive porque não queria machucar uma menina boa, mas agora não há necessidade de me conter. Obrigado, Sally. Ah, não... Grace." 

Se quiser viver, implore. Nunca se sabe, talvez eu conceda o seu desejo.

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

description.en: Who am I? Where am I? What am I doing? Wait, wait! Great Alliance Leader! Stop it already!! I really…… am not the Cult Leader! The entirety of the Jianghu thought that the Cult Leader of the Demonic Cult was a woman—who would've thought that the Cult Leader could even secretly start a harem?!

Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
description.fr: La vie de Na Hae-soo se désintègre lorsque son mari la trahit en ayant une liaison, la laissant accablée de dettes et perdant leur enfant. Dans un coup dévastateur, elle le surprend avec une femme plus jeune. Brisée et désespérée, Na Hae-soo sent sa vie s'effondrer autour d'elle. Cependant, un jeune homme mystérieux entre soudainement dans sa vie, lui demandant de lui enseigner l'amour adulte. Sa vulnérabilité et sa sincérité commencent à éveiller des émotions en Na Hae-soo, l'incitant à reconsidérer son chemin vers l'avenir.
description.id: Kehidupan Na Haesoo berubah ketika suaminya mengkhianatinya dengan berselingkuh, membuatnya terlilit hutang dan kehilangan anak mereka. Setelah itu, ia mendapati suaminya bersama seorang wanita yang lebih muda. Dengan perasaan hancur dan putus asa, Na Haesoo merasa kehidupannya di sekelilingnya runtuh dan hancur. Namun, seorang pemuda misterius tiba-tiba memasuki hidupnya, Beom Taeha, yang meminta untuk diajari tentang cinta orang dewasa. Keluguan dan ketulusannya mulai mengusik emosi dalam diri Na Haesoo, dan menantangnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali langkah apa yang akan diambil.
description.pl:
Mój mąż miał romans.
Nie wystarczy wziąć na siebie mnóstwo długów, stracić dziecko, na moich oczach zmieszałam się z bardzo młodą kobietą. Zranione życie usychało bez żadnego wyglądu.
"Pokarz mi miłość dorosłego" - podejrzany młodszy mężczyzna, który wtargnął w życie Na Haesoo.
Niebezpieczny i posłuszny, zaczyna potrząsać Na Haesoo.
description.pt-br: A vida de Na Hae-soo se desfaz quando seu marido a trai. Como se não bastasse estar endividada e ter perdido um filho… Em um golpe devastador, ela o flagra fazendo sexo com uma mulher bem mais jovem do que ela. Quebrada e desanimada, Na Hae-soo sente sua vida desmoronando ao seu redor.  No entanto, um jovem misterioso inesperadamente entra em sua vida, pedindo para ser ensinado sobre o amor adulto. Sua vulnerabilidade e sinceridade começam a despertar emoções em Na Hae-soo, desafiando-a a reconsiderar seu caminho a seguir.

altTitles.en: Hakumei & Mikochi: Tiny Little Life in the Woods

altTitles.th: ฮาคุเมกับมิโคจิ

description.en:
Nine centimeters (3.5 inches) tall, the tiny girls Hakumei and Mikochi live in the forest. 
Living in a house in a tree, riding insects and birds, and making umbrellas out of leaves, they live a happy and comfortable life. Follow their tiny but lovely lives as they live their day to day in a fantastic world of inchlings, animals, and strange happenings.  
  
**#EverydayHeroes Scans Note:**  
Chapter 39 is next after 34. No chapters were skipped, as we switched to using Harta magazine raws, and the chapters from the magazine use a different numbering system.

title.en: Tonari no Furi-san ga Tonikaku Kowai

altTitles.en: No Matter What You Say, Furi-san is Scary.

altTitles.ja: となりの布里さんがとにかくコワい。

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Furi-san ga Tonikaku Kowai

altTitles.zh: 邻座的布里同学总之就是好可怕

description.en: Ordinary High-schooler Taira Namito, who is ordinary inside, unknowingly becomes the target of the female delinquent-looking girl Furi Youko, a pure maiden at heart, who sits next to him.
description.ja: 隣の席は、ヤンキーでした―― 見た目がコワい布里さんと、見た目も中身も普通な平くん。 そんな正反対な二人が隣の席同士に。 ビビりまくる平くんだが、布里さんはまさかの一目ぼれ！そんな彼女のアプローチは、コワいんだけどなんだか可愛いくて…!?正反対な二人が繰り広げる、すれ違いラブコメディー！
description.pt-br: Um estudante comum do ensino médio, Taira Namito (que por dentro é mais comum ainda), por nenhum motivo, torna-se alvo da aparente delinquente Furi Youko, uma donzela de coração inocente, que por acaso senta-se ao seu lado.

title.en: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu

altTitles.ja: ギルドの受付嬢ですが、残業は嫌なのでボスをソロ討伐しようと思います

altTitles.ja-ro: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu

altTitles.en: I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I’ll Solo Any Boss to Clock Out on Time
I'm the guild receptionist, but since I don't want to work overtime, I think I'll just solo the boss

altTitles.zh: 虽然是公会柜台小姐，但是因为讨厌加班所以要去单挑BOSS

altTitles.en: I'm a Guild Receptionist, but I Hate Overtime So I'm Going to Slay the Boss Solo

description.en:
“It’s safe because it’s a desk job, super stable because it’s public work!” 

Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life… but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. 

To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina’s treasured job forbids side hustles. 

So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret…!
description.ja:
内勤だから安全、公務だから超安定！

そんな理想の職業「ギルドの受付嬢」となったアリナを待っていたのは、理想とは程遠い残業三昧の日々だった。

全てはダンジョンの攻略が滞っているせい！ 限界を迎えたアリナは、なんと大鎚を手に自らボス討伐に赴くのであった―。

description.en:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

altTitles.vi: Hijiri-kun Chỉ Muốn Sống Thanh Liêm

description.en: Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

title.en: Kujira no Kora wa Sajou ni Utau

altTitles.en: Children of the Whale Sing on the Sand

altTitles.de: Die Walkinder: The Children of the Whales

altTitles.ja-ro: Kujira no Kora wa Sajō ni Utau

altTitles.en: The Children of the Whales Sing Upon the Sand
Whale Calves Sing on the Debris

altTitles.ja: クジラの子らは砂上に歌う

altTitles.zh: 鲸鱼之子们在沙丘上歌唱

altTitles.vi: Những Người Con Của Cá Voi Bùn

description.en:
Chakuro is the 14-year-old archivist of the Mud Whale, a nigh-utopian island that floats across the surface of an endless sea of sand. Nine in ten of the inhabitants of the Mud Whale have been blessed and cursed with the ability to use thymia, special powers that doom them to an early death.  
  
Chakuro and his friends have stumbled across other islands, but they have never met, seen, or even heard of a human who wasn't from their own. One day, Chakuro visits an island as large as the Mud Whale and meets a girl who will change his destiny.  
  
Nominated for the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2017.
description.pt-br: Chakuro é um Registrador de 14 anos da Baleia de lama, uma ilha quase utópica que flutua na superfície de um infinito mar de areia. Nove em dez dos habitantes da Baleia de Lama foram abençoados e amaldiçoados com a capacidade de usar Saimia, poderes especiais que os condenam a uma morte precoce. Chakuro e os seus amigos nunca viram ninguém do mundo exterior, e passam os seus dias ansiosos por explorar e aprender sobre isso. Um dia, Chakuro visita uma ilha tão grande como a Baleia de Lama, onde conhece uma menina que mudará seu destino.
